author: adityapatwardhan
body:
Add tests for -is, -isnot, -contains, -notcontains and -like operators

Related code coverage report:

https://codecov.io/gh/PowerShell/PowerShell/src/9e41c647a9407e05d86f4971a6bd25719a7130d0/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/lang/parserutils.cs

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @adityapatwardhan is this for the parser or where-object params?  I see tests for -like, -contains, and -notcontains and -is is used by other tests

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @SteveL-MSFT  Added link to the report showing the missing coverage. Not sure why this is not covered.

title: Add tests for -is, -isnot, -contains, -notcontains and -like operators
